statements: DELETE FROM machines WHERE machine_id = 1 AND status = 'Active';
DELETE FROM machines WHERE cpu_usage > 80 OR disk_usage < 20;
DELETE FROM performance_metrics WHERE machine_id = '84de2c20-7d1b-4bf3-bb67-4e063813e05f' AND timestamp < '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM metrics WHERE metric_type = 'temperature' AND machine_id = 2;
DELETE FROM machines WHERE id = 1 AND location = 'Server Room';
DELETE FROM metrics WHERE metric_type = 'CPU Usage' AND metric_value > 80;
